---
name: Adding / Improving a Recipe in the NEMO Cookbook
about: Add a new recipe or improve an existing recipe included in the NEMO Cookbook
---

## Description

Briefly describe the purpose of the new recipe / reason for the modification of an existing recipe.

## Type of contribution

- [ ] New recipe
- [ ] Update to existing recipe

## Motivation

Who is this new recipe for, and what does the diagnostic help solve?

## Example

Have you included a complete example in your recipe, including constructing a minimal NEMODataTree, producing a diagnostic and visualising or presenting the final results?

Have you included background information to motivate your recipe and explain any diagnostics calculated.

## Dask

Is it possible to accelerate the performance of your recipe using dask?

## Documentation

- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] Documentation update not required

## Checklist

- [ ] New recipe follows the standards of all existing recipes
- [ ] Examples data used to construct your NEMODataTree is publicly accessible
- [ ] Recipe notebook runs successfully locally
- [ ] All recipe links work correctly
- [ ] All markdown text and equations render correctly
